title: Tsunami - Paluu paratiisiin
overview: Tsunami - Return to Paradise is a 4-part documentary whose main characters have fought for his life in the tsunami and lost all their family members Liisa Suonsivu and Gerts Friman, a diver Jani Mäkinen, who survived the tsunami and worked in a rescue operation, and Detective Inspector Ismo Kopra, who worked in Thailand after a year after the disaster, responsible for identifying and sending every Finn deceased home. In the documentary, the main characters return to Thailand and places they can never forget.
